pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Dynamic Listing[![PyPI Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/dynamic-listing)](https://pypi.org/project/dynamic-listing/)[![Documentation](https://img.shields.io/badge/documentation-ReadTheDocs-blue.svg)](https://dynamic-listing.readthedocs.io)[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)## DescriptionThe Django Dynamic List Package provides a robust way to create and manage listing views in Django applications, utilizing filters, bulk actions, and dynamic table, dynamic list, and dynamic grid components. It seamlessly integrates with [django-filter](https://django-filter.readthedocs.io/) to enhance your app's list views.## InstallationYou can install this package via pip:```bashpip install dynamic-listing```## DocumentationFor detailed documentation and usage instructions, please visit our [ReadTheDocs page](https://dynamic-listing.readthedocs.io).
